display.name: Brokers
display.description: A list of host/port pairs to use for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster

display.description: Choose authentication mode to connect to Kafka cluster
A PEM encoded private key file
display.name: Client Key

display.name: CA or Server Certificate
Connection Timeout
display.description: The amount of time in seconds to wait for the initial connection

display.name: Retry Backoff
display.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait for leader election to occur before retrying

display.name: Max Retry
display.description: The total number of times to retry a metadata request when the cluster is in the middle of a leader election

display.name: Refresh Frequency
display.description: The amount of time in seconds after which metadata is refreshed in the background. Set 0 to disable it.
